top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave

am supposed to be working. happened onto YT and seen this new one.  HAD TO CHECK IT OUT.  Love Phil for years.  This was a great cover Ms. Orlandi!. Just wish there was that amazing Phil drum beats in this too :P

comments_since_last_sample.body: Great harder cover of a great song.  You nailed it.
